title: The Lady vanishes
brief_description: The plot centres around a British group, en route to England by train from Switzerland. When a dear old lady disappears, a young woman seeks the aid of a fellow passenger to turn sleuth in an attempt to locate her. Something is amiss. Not all the travellers are who they appear to be. Cast: Michael Redgrave, Margaret Lockwood, Dame May Whitty, Paul Lukas, Cecil Parker.
